CustomField.formula: If (OR(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '0'), ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '1')), "Very Dissatisfied", ( if(OR(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '2'), ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '3')),"Dissatisfied", (if(OR(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '4'), ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '5')),"Somewhat Dissatisfied", (if(OR(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '6'), ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '7')),"Neutral", (if(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '8'),"Somewhat Satisfied", (if(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '9'),"Satisfied", (if(ISPICKVAL( Answer_4__c, '10'),"Very Satisfied","")))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Promoter/Detractor
